title: [8/31/2015] - Profanity Filter
body:
Hey everyone!

As some of you may have noticed, a profanity filter suddenly popped up over the weekend. As it turns out, the Boards have actually had a profanity filter all along - it’s just been broken on the NA Boards. The Boards Dev team fixed the bug in question, and the filter kicked in automatically with an old list of words. This was entirely our bad for coming out nowhere, and we apologize for any confusion and inconvenience. 

We will not be disabling the filter as it can be useful for spam / phishing prevention as well as truly egregious stuff, but we will be entirely nuking the current list of filtered words for the NA Boards. Right now we’re populating the list with known phishing/scamming links, and we’re looking to expand the list with other words/terms that the community doesn’t want here.

For the purpose of this discussion, moderators will not be punishing the use of inappropriate language so long as words are 1) simply listed, and 2) not used maliciously. If used inappropriately, we will take immediate and appropriate action. Thanks for participating!

EDIT (9/2/2015 1:56PM PST):

Thanks everyone for the suggestions for filtered words. I'll continue to update the list as more suggestions come in that we see should be included. Here is the current list of what will be added by the end of week. Keep in mind that the filtering of these words does not exclude the offender from punishment.
